version_description:
Invoice Maker Pro is the easiest way to make professional invoices. Create invoices & estimates wherever you are - with a customer, between jobs, or at home. Get paid faster.
===
Hello all,
We fixed the PDF format issue to fit more digits :)
Thanks for waiting.

Invoice Maker Pro is the easiest way to make professional invoices. Create invoices & estimates wherever you are - with a customer, between jobs, or at home. Get paid faster.
====
Hello all,
We have updated the following items;
- Done button for Quote and Estimate modules
Hope you will like it.
Thanks
